abstract: Tim Burton, the filmmaker behind "Beetlejuice," "Edward Scissorhands" and "Alice in Wonderland," has created a character called B. Boy that will make its first appearance as a balloon in the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade next month.
snippet: Tim Burton, the filmmaker behind "Beetlejuice," "Edward Scissorhands" and "Alice in Wonderland," has created a character called B. Boy that will make its first appearance as a balloon in the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade next month.
lead_paragraph: While Halloween might seem to be the holiday best suited to the macabre spirit of Tim Burton, that darkly inclined director is about to put his own spooky stamp on Thanksgiving.

headline.main: Tim Burton Lines Up a Spot in Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
